fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Congratulations. You have enrolled for AfterBuy; a completely hassle free one-stop place to value-track-care all your purchases & beyond. For future communication use id {customer_id}
fields.description: Send registration confirmation message to customer
Send customer service detail with product and valid coupon id

fields.template: Successfully register PRODUCT ID: {0} INTO CUSTOMER ID: {1}
fields.description: Send on product registration confirmation

fields.template: No service register for CUSTOMER ID: {gladmind_customer_id}
fields.description: Send on if customer id is not valid
Send on valid coupon id

fields.template: Free {service_type} expired and can avail {next_service_type} Free Service
fields.description: Send on invalid coupon id and it also contain next valid coupon id

fields.template: Invalid VIN or No Free service coupon available for this product

fields.description: Send coupon validation sms to customer also

fields.template: Free Service Coupon {service_coupon} to Avail {service_type} has expired (KMS/Date not valid) and Free Service Coupon {next_coupon} to Avail {next_service_type}
fields.description: Send coupon invalid sms to customer also
Send wrong coupon
Send message when dealer not authorized

fields.template: Reminder: Your Coupon {usc} for product {vin} will expire on {expired_date} having valid kms {valid_kms}
fields.description: Send reminder sms on coupon expiry

fields.template: Service Completion Tagged into the System. Thank you.
fields.description: Send sms on coupon completion

fields.template: Your Bike {vin} service is complete. Please pick your Bike before 6.30PM. {sa_name}, {sa_phone_number}.Thank you.
fields.description: Send message to customer on current service detail

fields.template: Invalid message For any assistance please contact our customer care at 9999999999
fields.description: Send sms when received message is invalid
Send the brand data detail
Receive message template from customer for registration
Receive this message template when customer request for his/her service
Receive this message when SA send to check the coupon status
Receive this message from SA for coupon close
Receive this message from Customer for all brand product detail
Send supported message format to customer

fields.template: Dear Customer, Thank you to purchase bike. Your customer id: {sap_customer_id}
fields.description: Send message to customer on purchase
